address: Xã Nhơn Khánh, Thị xã An Nhơn, Tỉnh Bình Định
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Reorganization**

Okay, so I'm presented with the old address "Xã Nhơn Khánh, Thị xã An Nhơn, Tỉnh Bình Định" and need to determine its current administrative status. Let's break this down systematically.

First, I identified the old province, "Tỉnh Bình Định." Then I immediately went to check for province-level changes, specifically any resolutions related to mergers or divisions. Following the relevant regulations and resolutions, I quickly found that "Tỉnh Bình Định" was, in fact, merged with "Tỉnh Gia Lai," now becoming part of the latter.

Now focusing on the specific "Xã Nhơn Khánh," I started hunting for any relevant resolutions. I had to look beyond standard province names as there was a change. Resolution 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15 popped up as highly relevant because it pertains to the administrative restructuring within the now-relevant province of Gia Lai.

Analyzing that resolution, line 107 immediately caught my eye. It explicitly mentioned "Xã Nhơn Khánh" alongside "phường Bình Định" and "xã Nhơn Phúc," indicating a merger to form the new "Phường Bình Định." The province referenced was, as expected, "Tỉnh Gia Lai."

To be absolutely certain, I cross-checked this against known "New wards" data. The entry `{"ward_code":"21907","ward_name":"Phường Bình Định","province_name":"Tỉnh Gia Lai"}` confirmed the new ward and its location.

**In short, my analysis reveals that the old "Xã Nhơn Khánh" from the former "Tỉnh Bình Định" (now part of "Tỉnh Gia Lai") has been administratively merged into the new "Phường Bình Định" within "Tỉnh Gia Lai."** My confidence is very high here due to the clear and explicit language of the resolution.

citation.header: 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Gia Lai
citation.line: 107. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của phường Bình Định, xã Nhơn Khánh và xã Nhơn Phúc thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Bình Định.
